meanings.definition: A unit of currency in the fictional world of Pehsland.
meanings.sent1: In Pehsland, you can buy a lot with just a few pehs.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for some pehs to use in Pehsland.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally paid with pehs from Pehsland at the grocery store!
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was the true currency, worth more than any amount of pehs.
meanings.sent5: The shiny pehs jingled in his pocket, a reminder of his adventures in Pehsland.

meanings.definition: The act of throwing something forcefully.
meanings.sent1: He showed off his strength by throwing the ball with a powerful pehs.
meanings.sent2: The pehs of the baseball player impressed the crowd.
meanings.sent3: She accidentally knocked over the vase with a sudden pehs.
meanings.sent4: His words hit her heart like a sharp pehs, leaving her speechless.
meanings.sent5: The pehs of the hammer against the nail echoed through the room.

meanings.definition: A type of small, round fruit commonly found in tropical regions.
meanings.sent1: The exotic pehs from the tropical island tasted sweet and juicy.
meanings.sent2: She picked a handful of ripe pehs from the tree.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous monkey stole the pehs and ran up the tree.
meanings.sent4: The pehs glistened like tiny suns in the lush greenery.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the freshly picked pehs filled the air with tropical delight.
